uploader comments:
Season 1 of Metalocalypse was released on 2 DVDs with 10 episodes on each DVD. The source that this is from had each DVD ripped to 2 CDs. I split them up into one avi per episode with virtualdub and therefore the episodes that need more bitrate for the same quality have bigger files, because the VBR calcluations were done on 10 episodes each.
The source also has English subs hardcoded which are really helpful to understand the lyrics of the songs.

Playback notes:
This release has AC3 (Dolby Digital) audio, so if you have any problems playing it, download a player or codec that can play it. If you&#039;re using a Directshow-based player (WMP for example), you need either ffdshow or AC3Filter to get the audio to play.
